commentary: alzarri joseph to dube , 4 leg byes 4 leg byes that  that  csk  winning run against rcb at fort chepauk continues  there is a review , but more in desperation , i think  aims for the yorker that hits dube  pad and goes to the fine-leg fence  ball tracker confirms the ball pitched outside leg  ruturaj gaikwad has made a winning start to his captaincy tenure  see all photos long-stop
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to shivam dube , leg byes , four , that'll do well enough for csk  they get their 2024 campaign off to a winning start  fired in full and at the boots , was just a touch down leg , shivam dube looked to flick it and missed , brushed his boot and went down fine to the fine-leg ropes

commentary: alzarri joseph to jadeja ,  2 runs 2 runs good ball outside-off , he thrashes it away to deep-point  some confusion and the result is an over-throw  what happened is a throw was fired from the deep who hit direct at the striker  end  rawat , meanwhile feels there is a chance of a run-out at the non-striker  end  he lobs the ball , misses and there is no one backing up
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to jadeja , 2 runs , length delivery just outside-off , cut away towards deep-point  oh dear , comedy of errors , the throw that came back in hit the stumps at the keeper  end and the keeper then had a shy at the stumps at the other end while the bowler had turned and was walking back to his mark

commentary: green to mitchell , out out the short ball does the trick for green  banged in short outside-off , mitchell was looking to go over long-on  does not get any power on the pull and patidar makes no mistake at long-on  see all photos
second_commentary: green to mitchell , out caught by rajat patidar   the short-ball tactic finally pays off for rcb  looks like rcb had a plan and they stuck with it  banged into the deck on outside-off , mitchell made a bit of room by backing away and looked to flat-bat this over long-on , didn't get nearly enough and it came off the top half  went straight down patidar  throat at long-on and another timely wicket for rcb  mitchell c rajat patidar b green 22 18  [6s-2]

commentary: green to dube ,  1 run 1 run another miscue and the ball falls in no-man  land  banged in short just above his hip  he mistimes his pull completely but the balls falls around the vacant square-leg area
second_commentary: green to shivam dube , 1 run , in the air but safe  again green goes good and into the body , cramps him for room as he looks to pull and lobs up , lands safely in the square-leg region

commentary: green to dube , no run no run loud , loud appeal as dube looks for a pull and gets beaten  but the umpire is unmoved  faf has asked for a review  don't think there was any bat there , though  bouncer just outside-off  he eyes the pull , is late again on it  rawat was absolutely certain there was an edge  but replays confirm there was a gap between bat and ball
second_commentary: green to shivam dube , no run , nothing on ultraedge , review lost  banged into the deck and going across the batter again , was just outside-off , rushed him with the pace and cramped him for room as he looked to pull , just about went over the top-edge , was extremely close but nothing on ultraedge to rcb  plight

commentary: green to rahane , out out excellent catch by maxwell at square-leg and rahane  sprightly knock ends  good ball but the line was crucial here  it was outside-off , which meant rahane had to fetch it and he could not control his pull  maxwell is a few steps in from the boundary  but he adjusts well , and takes a reverse-cupped catch over his head see all photos
second_commentary: green to rahane , out caught by maxwell   superb catch from maxwell in the deep  rahane perishes but he  done his job  good on middle-leg again , didn't rise as much though and rahane was hanging back again , he just checked his pull this time and it went off the top half , was still traveling but maxwell intercepted it on the deep backward-square-leg ropes  he was a few yards in but did brilliantly to run to his left and jump at the right second to reel it in  much needed for rcb , just keeps the morale up  rahane c maxwell b green 27 19  [6s-2]

commentary: karn to mitchell ,  six runs six runs this time over long-off  floated slower outside-off , he goes over long-off now  such clean striking  free swing of the blade from mitchell
second_commentary: karn sharma to mitchell , six , two in a row  tossed up full outside-off , more than enough room for mitchell to free his arms this time and he launches it outside-off , karn sharma under pressure

commentary: karn to mitchell ,  six runs six runs finally connect at one  tossed up just a touch but that was right in mitchell  arc  he extends his arm and swings it miles over long-on
second_commentary: karn sharma to mitchell , six , mitchell goes big  floated up full on outside-off , this was in his zone and he cleared his front-leg and mowed it straight down the ground , cleared the ropes so easily

commentary: karn to mitchell , no run no run darted quicker on off stump , he prods half-forward and pushes to cover
second_commentary: karn sharma to mitchell , no run , tossed up full on outside-off , mitchell prods forward and knocks it towards cover

commentary: dagar to rahane , no run no run pushes the length ball quicker on leg-stump , rahane goes back looking for a flick but misses and is rapped on the pad with the ball going down leg
second_commentary: mayank dagar to rahane , no run , fired in quicker on a length , angles into the pads and skids through this time , beats rahane who was looking to turn it into the leg-side and hits his pad , would've gone down leg

commentary: dagar to mitchell ,  1 run 1 run a touch quicker outside-off , he pushes to faf at cover who flicks in back-handed flick  but rahane was in
second_commentary: mayank dagar to mitchell , 1 run , flatter delivery outside-off , mitchell shuffles across his stumps early and knocks it towards cover for a quick single , even a quick pick-up and throw from faf can't find rahane short

commentary: dagar to mitchell , no run no run ooh , some turn outside-off  mitchell is camped on the backfoot and defends towards cover
second_commentary: mayank dagar to mitchell , no run , shade fuller and just outside-off , mitchell plays back again as he knocks it towards cover , bit of bite and turn again

commentary: dagar to mitchell , no run no run shimmies down the track but dagar shortens the length and mitchell has to defend
second_commentary: mayank dagar to mitchell , no run , length delivery on outside-off , saw the batter running down the track and dropped it just a touch shorter , just holds in the surface a touch too

commentary: dagar to mitchell , no run no run a tad short just outside-off , he stays back and eases to backward-point
second_commentary: mayank dagar to mitchell , no run , length delivery outside-off , punched straight to point

commentary: dagar to rahane ,  1 run 1 run length outside-off , he pushes it through point for a run
second_commentary: mayank dagar to rahane , 1 run , full outside-off , just a touch early through his drive but it goes into the gap and through to sweeper cover

commentary: karn to ravindra , out out he  gone now  one shot too many for rachin  was a length ball leg-stump  he sweeps eyeing another six , but doesn't connect as cleanly  deep backward-square-leg settles himself and takes a comfortable catch  lovely debut for rachin who falls for a 15-ball 37  see all photos
second_commentary: karn sharma to ravindra , out caught by rajat patidar   karn has his man now - was pushed through quicker and at the stumps , ravindra went down on his knee as he looked to play the slog-sweep - hit it hard and hit it flat , straight down patidar  throat at deep backward-square-leg  the dangerous ravindra departs and rcb can heave a sigh of relief  ravindra c rajat patidar b karn sharma 37 15  [4s-3 6s-3]

commentary: karn to ravindra ,  six runs six runs dropped short and he pumps it for six  on off stump , he rocks back and hammers him over deep midwicket fielder  head
second_commentary: karn sharma to ravindra , six , a long hop and it  been hammered - dragged half-way by karn , ravindra rocks back and then thumps it powerfully over wide mid-wicket , there  a fielder in the deep , but he  well away from the ball

commentary: karn to rahane ,  1 run 1 run shimmies down the track to the length ball on leg-stump and pushes to long-on
second_commentary: karn sharma to rahane , 1 run , karn dragged the length back as rahane came down the pitch , worked down to long-on for a single

commentary: karn to rahane , no run no run flatter outside-off , he stays back and punches to backward-point
second_commentary: karn sharma to rahane , no run , pushed through by karn - rahane backs away and finds backward-point with the cut

commentary: karn to rahane ,  2 runs 2 runs fuller in length middle-stump , he flicks it to deep midwicket and some excellent running get them a couple of runs
second_commentary: karn sharma to rahane , 2 runs , loopy delivery leg-stump , clipped in front of square on the on-side and they race back for the second

commentary: karn to rahane , no run no run flatter on the stumps , he goes back and pushes to the on-side and karn gets across
second_commentary: karn sharma to rahane , no run , flighted delivery leg-stump , worked off the back-foot to the bowler

commentary: yash dayal to rahane ,  3 runs 3 runs fuller outside-off , he digs it to backward-point and sets off  the fielder throws down the stumps at the non-striker end , but rahane is in  also gets two extra runs via the ricochet
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , 3 runs , more runs , this is so frustrating for rcb - yorker length delivery and it was jammed in front of cover-point , the run was always there , but the fielder has a shy at the bowler  end , no one  backing him up and rahane gets a couple of more runs in the bargain

commentary: yash dayal to rahane ,  2 runs 2 runs juuuuust over faf  head  length ball outside-off  he was looking  to go up and over mid-off , doesn't connect as well  faf runs back , but can't get a hand on it
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , 2 runs , a mistimed drive , but the ball drops over faf  right shoulder - fuller length delivery and just outside-off , rahane went hard on the drive , came off the thick-edge and he  lucky to have cleared the infield

commentary: yash dayal to rahane ,  2 runs 2 runs fuller in length well outside-off  he opens his arms and drives aerially to the right of deep-point
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , 2 runs , fuller length delivery and well wide of off - rahane plays with a bent knee as he slices the drive over backward-point , comes back for the second

commentary: yash dayal to rahane ,  six runs six runs stand and deliver  shot of the evening so far , for me  good ball outside-off  he stands still and pumps him over mid-off and eventually the ropes for a 84m six
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , six , rahane throws his hands on a length ball and sends it carving over mid-off for a maximum - good and angling across the right-hander , he  smote it on the rise and the timing is sublime , into the stands at long-off

commentary: yash dayal to rahane , no run no run very full and outside-off , rahane tries to squirt this fine  makes no connection once more
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , no run , fuller length delivery and shaping across the right-hander - rahane was looking to jam it out and missed

commentary: yash dayal to rahane , no run no run lovely bowling again from dayal  gets this on  a length angling away from rahane , who is on the move while looking for a drive  gets beaten
second_commentary: yash dayal to rahane , no run , dayal is bowling beautifrully to the right-handers , pitched up and the angle takes the ball away from rahane  rteach , past the waft and into the gloves of the keeper

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , no run no run raps him in the midriff at pace  good again on middle  rachin looks to hack that away , but is beaten for pace
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , no run , short of a good length and around the outside-off channel , ravindra swings and is struck high on the body

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra ,  2 runs 2 runs just short of faf at mid-off  was a good ball outside-off , he stands tall and slaps it hard but aerially  faf dives forward , but the ball clearly fell short
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , 2 runs , just short of faf at mid-off , and he then has to chase , does well to keep them down to a couple - good and well wide of off , flat-batted uppishly towards mid-off and had faf diving forward on the catch

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra ,  2 runs 2 runs just short of faf at mid-off  was a good ball outside-off , he stands tall and slaps it hard but aerially  faf dives forward , but the ball clearly fell short
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , wide , short and down leg , ravindra was looking to help it on its way with the pull and missed , called as a wide

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , 1 wide 1 wide good ball down leg  he looks to help it away , can't connect but gets a wide  rawat does well to his right
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , 2 runs , just short of faf at mid-off , and he then has to chase , does well to keep them down to a couple - good and well wide of off , flat-batted uppishly towards mid-off and had faf diving forward on the catch

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , 1 wide 1 wide good ball down leg  he looks to help it away , can't connect but gets a wide  rawat does well to his right
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , wide , short and down leg , ravindra was looking to help it on its way with the pull and missed , called as a wide

commentary: alzarri joseph to rahane ,  1 run 1 run good ball outside-off , he pats it to deep-third
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to rahane , 1 run , good and just outside-off , rahane runs it down towards third-man for a single

commentary: alzarri joseph to rahane , no run no run big shout for lbw but the umpire stays unmoved  no review taken  length ball at 146kph that strikes rahane on the pad  think he got an inside-edge back onto the pad
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to rahane , no run , a long lbw appeal , but they ain't reviewing it , must've been an inside-edge , too close to dab and rahane squeezed an under-edge onto his front-pad

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra ,  1 run 1 run length on off stump , he stays leg-side of the ball and pushes to cover and sets off
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , 1 run , alzarri shortens the length around off , punched to the left of cover-point for a single

commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra ,  six runs six runs hello there mr joseph says rachin as he pulls him for six  banged in short and on his hips , he helps it over fine-leg with ease
second_commentary: alzarri joseph to ravindra , six , cracking shot , pacy short ball from alzarri - but this is at the hips of ravindra , he swivels across anmd then hammers the pull over long-leg for a maximum

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , out out edged and taken on the second attempt by green at first slip  this is excellent bowling and also excellent captaincy from faf to keep the slip in  keeps it on a length but well outside-off stump  gaikwad gets forward reaching for the drive  he gets a thick-edge and green takes a fairly simple catch albeit on the second attempt  important wicket for rcb see all photos
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , out caught by green   edged and caught  green on the second attempt and he has big hands , this is some reward for dayal - troubled gaikwad with the angle and has finally nailed him - pitched up and pushed across with the angle , gaikwad had to reach out on the drive , there  no control over the shot and gets a thick-edge to slip  right  green was quick to react , but the ball popped out , fortunately for rcb - he  alert enough to grab the rebound off the knee  gaikwad c green b yash dayal 15 15  [4s-3]

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , four runs four runs strayed on the pads and gaikwad cashes in  length down leg , he shuffles across and clips fine and for four  six fours and six already in this innings
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , four , wrong line from dayal , short and at the pads - gaikwad gets inside the line and nudged it very fine , beats the man in the ring and runs away

commentary: yash dayal to ravindra ,  1 run 1 run he  timing these really well so far  that was on a good length outside-off , he stands tall and slaps it to mid-off
second_commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , 1 run , on a good length and just outside-off , driven to the right of mid-off for a single

commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , no run no run a hint of shape away from dayal on that length ball outside-off , he prods forward and punches it nicely but straight to cover point
second_commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , no run , fuller length delivery outside-off , ravindra leans across and defends it with an open face to cover-point

commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , four runs four runs shot  fuller-length ball but was veering down leg  he flicks it with authority past short-fine-leg
second_commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , four , more runs , too full and too straight from dayal - on the pads and it  whipped away backward of square on the on-side , beats the man in the ring and races away

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad ,  1 run 1 run length ball angling away from gaikwad outside-off  he pushes at it with an open face of the bat to deep-third
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , 1 run , fuller length delivery outside-off , gaikwad plays with an angled bat and runs it backward of square on the off-side for a single

commentary: siraj to ravindra ,  six runs six runs top edge for six  rachin is enjoying a bit of luck on ipl debut  a well-directed short of a length ball aimed at his body  rachin swivel-pulls gets a big top edge that goes over short-fine-leg and just over the ropes
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , six , top-edge and six , luck running ravindra  way at the moment - banged in short and he  late on the pull , gets a massive top-edge , was always a safe shot with fine-leg inside the ring , this one has enough power to sail over the ropes

commentary: siraj to gaikwad ,  1 run 1 run good ball outside-off , he gets across and slaps it to deep-point
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , 1 run , short of a good length and well wide of off , chopped to the left of cover-point for a single

commentary: siraj to ravindra ,  1 run 1 run fuller in length leg-stump , he punches it neatly but straight to mid-on
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , 1 run , fuller length delivery on the stumps , driven to the left of mid-on and they're off for a quick single

commentary: siraj to gaikwad ,  1 run 1 run another excellent stop from dagar  this time at cover  was fuller in length outside-off , he leans into the cover-drive but dagar dives full-length to his right to save three
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , 1 run , mayank has saved a few more runs here - fuller length delivery and well wide of off , driven to the right of cover where he threw himself and made a one-handed save

commentary: siraj to ravindra ,  1 run 1 run chipped just over the bowler  head  was a length ball on middle , he was looking to clip it but closed the face of the bat early  the leading edge just evades the bowler
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , 1 run , ravindra gets lucky now - on a good length and angling back into the left-hander , ravindra was early into the tuck , closed the bat-face and the leading edghe popped over siraj  outstretched right-hand

commentary: siraj to ravindra , four runs four runs flicked for four  that  a lovely wristy flick from rachin  was a length ball on his pads , he sends it all across the carpet and deep backward-square-leg can't do much
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , four , beautifully played , fuller length delivery and angling into the pads , ravindra lets the ball come , brings his wrists into play and then flicks it backward of square on the on-side , beat the despairing dive from the fielder in the deep

commentary: siraj to ravindra , four runs four runs flicked for four  that  a lovely wristy flick from rachin  was a length ball on his pads , he sends it all across the carpet and deep backward-square-leg can't do much
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , wide , siraj loses his line and spills one well down the leg-side , called as a wide

commentary: siraj to ravindra , 1 wide 1 wide full but sprays it down leg  rawat does well to his right  called a wide
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , four , beautifully played , fuller length delivery and angling into the pads , ravindra lets the ball come , brings his wrists into play and then flicks it backward of square on the on-side , beat the despairing dive from the fielder in the deep

commentary: siraj to ravindra , 1 wide 1 wide full but sprays it down leg  rawat does well to his right  called a wide
second_commentary: siraj to ravindra , wide , siraj loses his line and spills one well down the leg-side , called as a wide

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run no run goes past the outside-edge for a third straight time  changes the length again  was good outside-off  gaikwad throws his hands at it looking for a swish , gets beaten
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run , beaten , short of a good length and angling across the right-hander , brings out a loose waft and gaikwad  beaten on the outside-edge

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run no run and again  pushes the fuller and angling away from gaikwad inviting him for a drive  he takes the bait but only connects at thin air
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run , much better from yash - pitched up and pushed across with the natural angle , dragged gaikwad into the drive and beats him on the outside-edge

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run no run ooh , close  good length ball outside-off with a hint of away shape  gaikwad nibbles at it and gets beaten
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run , lovely delivery , short of a good length and a hint of shape away from off , gaikwad has a poke at that and nearly edges it through to the keeper

commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run no run fails to get a decent connection on that  length ball on gaikwad  pads , he gets across and clip but can't beat fine-leg
second_commentary: yash dayal to gaikwad , no run , good and at the hips , tucked straight to the fielder at short fine

commentary: yash dayal to ravindra ,  1 run 1 run fuller in length leg-stump , he clips past mid-on for a run
second_commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , 1 run , on a good length and angling into the left-hander , worked in front of square on the on-side , to the left of mid-on for a single

commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , four runs four runs gets an inside-edge for four  beginners luck for rachin  was a length ball outside-off , he looks to flay it away through the off-side , gets a thick inside-edge just past off stump and past the keeper  right
second_commentary: yash dayal to ravindra , four , streaky and four , fuller length delivery and holding its line outside-off - ravindra goes hard on the drive , gets a big inside-edge that runs away past the stumps and away from rawat  reach

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run no run good ball outside-off  he plays inside the line of the ball and is beaten  rawat is hit on the knee with the ball going to him on the half-volley
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run , on a good length and holding its line outside-off - stayed very low and burst under gaikwad  bat , bouncing through to the keepert

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , four runs four runs in the air but in the gap  that was close  was a length ball floated well outside-off  he opens the face of the blade and drives aerially between backward-point and point  picked the gap to perfection
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , four , uppish and four , fuller length delivery and shaping away from wide of off , gaikwad is lured into the drive , he doesn't get on top of the bounce , but does manage to find the gap square past cover-point

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run no run length ball tailing away from gaikwad well outside-off  he leaves it alone
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run , on a good length and shaping away from outside-off - gaikwad covers the line , lifts his bat and lets it go

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run no run lovely timing and even better fielding at backward-point  good ball outside-off  the width was the key  he cuts it hard but dagar flings to his right and saves a certain four
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run , good and well wide of off , punched to the right of backward-point where mayank dagar makes an acrobatic stop , saved a certain boundary

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run no run play and a miss now  good ball shaping away from gaikwad , who has a swish at it but doesn't connect  rawat collects on the bounce
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , no run , short of a good length and angling adcross the right-hander , stays a fraction low and goes under gaikwad  poke , bounced through to the keeper

commentary: siraj to gaikwad , four runs four runs bang  short ball outside-off , he swivels and pull over square-leg with minimum of fuss  that  some way to start your ipl
second_commentary: siraj to gaikwad , four , cracking shot , ruturaj is off and running - friendly short ball from siraj , shoulders arms up to the right-hander , gaikwad swivels across and then hammers the pull over square-leg for a boundary
